price: Tí o bá kúkú bi wọ́n léèrè, dájúdájú wọ́n á wí pé: “Àwa kàn ń rojọ́ lásán ni, a sì ń ṣàwàdà ni.” Sọ pé: “Ṣé Allāhu, àwọn āyah Rẹ̀ àti Òjíṣẹ́ Rẹ̀ ni ẹ̀ ń fi ṣe yẹ̀yẹ́?”
arabic: وَلَئِن سَأَلۡتَهُمۡ لَيَقُولُنَّ إِنَّمَا كُنَّا نَخُوضُ وَنَلۡعَبُۚ قُلۡ أَبِٱللَّهِ وَءَايَٰتِهِۦ وَرَسُولِهِۦ كُنتُمۡ تَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
